description: [DEADWOOD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1134) opens and writes zeroes to the first 512 bytes of each drive, deleting the MBR. [DEADWOOD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1134) then sends the control code IOCTL_DISK_DELETE_DRIVE_LAYOUT to ensure the MBR is removed from the drive.(Citation: SentinelOne Agrius 2021)

external_references.description: Amitai Ben & Shushan Ehrlich. (2021, May). From Wiper to Ransomware: The Evolution of Agrius. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
